name: src/animations/BackgroundColor.js
BackgroundColor
description:
BackgroundColor is designed to cycle
between two background colors for an HTMLElement.

params.name: options.loop
params.description: Should the animation loop or not

name: src/animations/Ripples.js
Ripples
description:
Ripples is a fully customizable effect that
generates... ripples.
It can be used as highlighter for click or items.
It can also be used as loader whith loop active.
todo: Add array and function support to some parameters

params.name: options.width
params.description: Width for the container (any allowed css value)

params.name: options.height
params.description: Height for the container (any allowed css value)

params.name: options.easing
params.description: Easing formula (any allowed easing by animejs)

params.name: options.ripples.width
params.description: Initial innerWidth of a ripple (any allowed css value)

params.name: options.ripples.height
params.description: Initial innerWidth of a ripple (any allowed css value)

params.name: options.ripples.borderColor
params.description: Border color of ripples (any allowed css value)

params.name: options.ripples.borderStyle
params.description: Border style of ripples (any allowed css value)

params.name: options.ripples.borderWidth
params.description: Initial border width (any allowed css value)

params.name: options.ripples.background
params.description: Background property of a ripple (any allowed css value)

name: _ripple
description: Generates a ripple animation given the options

return.description: Animation that can be added to timeline

name: src/animations/ThreeDotsBouncing.js
ThreeDotsBouncing
description:
ThreeDotsBouncing provides a block of
 three dots bouncing from left to right and reverse.

name: constructor
description:
Creates an instance of ThreeDotsBouncing with given
 options

params.name: options.offset
params.description: Offset duration between each dots animation

params.name: options.width
params.description: Width of the container (any CSS compatible value)

params.name: options.dots.color
params.description: color of a dot (any CSS compatible form)

name: block
description: Get the HTMLElement for the block

name: src/beloader-animations.js
src/core/AbstractAnimation.js
constructor
description: Generates unique ID and stores options

name: block
description:
Always return false
 if not overriden in childs class

name: check
description: Check if required options have been provided

params.name: opts
params.description: Option name or array of options names

name: src/core/publicpath.js
scripts
description: This script initialize webpack public path for CDN usage compatibility

name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "beloader-animations",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Wrapper for animeJS with nice presets to insert animated blocks and animate text, backgrounds and colors",
  "main": "dist/beloader-animations.min.js",
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "build": "webpack --config webpack.conf/build.js -p",
    "dev": "webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.conf/dev.js",
    "test": "./node_modules/.bin/karma start --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage",
    "test:dry": "./node_modules/.bin/karma start --single-run --browsers ChromeHeadless",
    "test:dev": "karma start --browsers ChromeHeadless",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "prepub": "npm run test:dry && npm run build && npm run docs"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-eslint": "^8.2.2",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.3",
    "babel-plugin-syntax-dynamic-import": "^6.18.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "clean-webpack-plugin": "^0.1.19",
    "color-themes-for-google-code-prettify": "^2.0.4",
    "coveralls": "^3.0.0",
    "css-loader": "^0.28.11",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-inject-script-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-inject-style-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.19.0",
    "eslint-loader": "^1.9.0",
    "html-loader": "^0.5.1",
    "istanbul-instrumenter-loader": "^3.0.0",
    "karma": "^2.0.0",
    "karma-babel-preprocessor": "^7.0.0",
    "karma-chai": "^0.1.0",
    "karma-chrome-launcher": "^2.2.0",
    "karma-coverage-istanbul-reporter": "^1.4.1",
    "karma-firefox-launcher": "^1.1.0",
    "karma-ie-launcher": "^1.0.0",
    "karma-mocha": "^1.3.0",
    "karma-opera-launcher": "^1.0.0",
    "karma-phantomjs-launcher": "^1.0.4",
    "karma-runscript-preprocessor": "0.0.5",
    "karma-safari-launcher": "^1.0.0",
    "karma-sinon": "^1.0.5",
    "karma-sourcemap-loader": "^0.3.7",
    "karma-webpack": "2.0.6",
    "mocha": "^5.0.1",
    "phantomjs-prebuilt": "^2.1.16",
    "postcss-cssnext": "^3.1.0",
    "postcss-loader": "^2.1.3",
    "postcss-reporter": "^5.0.0",
    "puppeteer": "^1.2.0",
    "semantic-release": "^15.1.5",
    "sinon": "^4.5.0",
    "style-loader": "^0.20.2",
    "sugarss": "^1.0.1",
    "webpack": "^3.11.0",
    "webpack-bundle-analyzer": "^2.11.0",
    "webpack-merge": "^4.1.2"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/beloader/beloader-animations.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "loader",
    "splash screen",
    "animation",
    "animations",
    "block",
    "animated",
    "app loader",
    "waiting screen",
    "animejs"
  ],
  "author": "Liqueur de Toile",
  "license": "AGPL-3.0",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/beloader/beloader-animations/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/beloader/beloader-animations",
  "dependencies": {
    "animejs": "^2.2.0",
    "dot-object-array": "^3.1.0",
    "elementify": "^1.2.0",
    "uniqid": "^4.1.1"
  }
}

tests/Ripples.spec.js
tests/ThreeDotsBouncing.spec.js
